title: Editor: Marshall Friedman
article: Marshall Friedman was born in Manhattan in 2012, but currently lives in Brooklyn. He is a bookworm, and his hobbies include reading, writing, drawing, and video games. His favorite foods are bagels and sushi, and his favorite restaurant is Sociale. He is 11 years old and his favorite color is turquoise. He also plays the guitar!
author: Marshall Friedman
